rules:
Rule ID: 1
Description: The system must redact and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII) before processing.
Category: Data
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: GDPR, CCPA

Rule ID: 2
Description: All audit logs must be stored in an append-only database or JSON format.
Category: Operational
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: ISO 27001, SOC 2

Rule ID: 3
Description: The system must validate all generated requirements against internal policy documents.
Category: Legal
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies

Rule ID: 4
Description: The system must have a role-based SME validation loop to ensure accuracy and relevance of generated requirements.
Category: Operational
Severity: Medium
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies

Rule ID: 5
Description: The system must be securely deployed in on-premises or VPC environments.
Category: Security
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: ISO 27001, SOC 2

Rule ID: 6
Description: The system must allow users to upload PDF/email transcript and auto-generate user stories with acceptance criteria.
Category: Operational
Severity: Medium
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies

Rule ID: 7
Description: The system must push generated requirements to Jira and store logs in a dashboard.
Category: Operational
Severity: Medium
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies

Rule ID: 8
Description: The system must ensure consistent formatting and compliance in all generated requirements.
Category: Legal
Severity: High
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies

Rule ID: 9
Description: The system must ingest unstructured data from various sources including meeting transcripts, emails, PDFs/DOCX, and web scraping for regulatory documents.
Category: Data
Severity: Medium
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies

Rule ID: 10
Description: The system must assume that all unstructured data provided is accurate and up-to-date.
Category: Data
Severity: Low
Applicable Standards/Regulations: Internal Policies
